statements: UPDATE clinical_trials_participants SET participant_name = 'John Doe' WHERE participant_id = 1;
UPDATE clinical_trials_participants SET participant_age = 35 WHERE participant_id = 2;
UPDATE clinical_trials_participants SET participation_status = 'Active' WHERE participant_id = 3;
UPDATE clinical_trials_participants SET participant_gender = 'Female' WHERE participant_age > 30;
UPDATE clinical_trials_participants SET participant_name = 'John Doe', participation_status = 'Active' WHERE participant_id = 123;
UPDATE clinical_trials_participants SET participant_age = participant_age + 1 WHERE participant_id IN (234, 345, 456);
UPDATE participants SET age = 25 WHERE participant_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE activities SET duration_minutes = 60 WHERE activity_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE participants SET gender = 'Female' WHERE participant_id = '323e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
UPDATE participants SET age = age + 1 WHERE gender = 'Male';
UPDATE activities SET duration_minutes = duration_minutes * 1.25 WHERE activity_date >= '2022-01-01';
UPDATE participants p SET participant_name = a.activity_name FROM activities a WHERE p.participant_id = a.participant_id;
UPDATE participants SET age = 30 WHERE participant_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE activities SET duration = 60 WHERE activity_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE trial_info SET total_participants = 50 WHERE trial_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
UPDATE participants SET age = age + 1 WHERE enrollment_date < '2022-01-01';
UPDATE activities SET duration = CASE WHEN activity_name = 'Swimming' THEN duration + 30 WHEN activity_name = 'Jogging' THEN duration + 15 ELSE duration END WHERE activity_date >= '2022-03-01';
UPDATE trial_info SET total_participants = total_participants + 1 WHERE start_date > '2022-05-01' AND end_date < '2022-09-01';
UPDATE Participants SET age = 25 WHERE participant_id = 1;
UPDATE Observations SET result = 'Successful' WHERE observation_id = 1;
UPDATE Measurements SET value = 10.5 WHERE measurement_id = 1;
UPDATE Participants SET age = age + 1 WHERE participant_id = 1;
UPDATE Trials SET researcher = 'John Doe' WHERE researcher = 'Jane Smith';
UPDATE Observations SET result = 'Pass' WHERE trial_id = 5 AND observation_id = 10;
UPDATE participants SET age = 25 WHERE participant_id = 1;
UPDATE trials SET start_date = '2023-01-15' WHERE trial_id = 2;
UPDATE activities SET duration = 60 WHERE activity_id = 3;
UPDATE participants SET gender = 'Female' WHERE age < 30
UPDATE trials SET end_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE trial_name = 'A/B Testing'
UPDATE activities SET description = 'Updated description' WHERE duration > 60
